Index.name: Viet Anh
Index.perex: I'm an experienced front-end web developer who cares about writing clean, maintainable code using the latest tools and best practices. I'm passionate, communicative, and always eager to learn—both in tech and beyond – driven by honesty, empathy, patience, and a strong sense of responsibility.
